settings.text:
DECO 5000 is the trance-driven alias of Norwegian producer Marensius, blending classic trance nostalgia with a contemporary sonic edge. His euphoric yet driving sound has earned him hundreds of thousands of streams across platforms, with standout releases like "Echoes" on Underzone and "Blue Skies" was supported by TDJ’s on her SPF Infini VA.

Rooted in space, his appearances are rare, but highly sonic and energetic; taking the audience on a bouncy journey through space and time. Soaring euphoric melodies, ethereal pads and pulsating basslines sets the tone for the 5k. 

Next up, DECO 5000 is set to drop his debut EP: “DECOSYSTEMA VOL. 1”, this spring on COMMA.records. The EP captures the true essence of the 5k as he continues to push the boundaries of modern trance and interplanetary domination.
